thread.title: Teen Mom 2's Kailyn Lowry Gets Really Real About Her Third Pregnancy
thread.title_full: Teen Mom 2's Kailyn Lowry Gets Really Real About Her Third Pregnancy

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Teen Mom 2's Kailyn Lowry Gets Really Real About Her Third Pregnancy
text:
Teen Mom 2 's Kailyn Lowry has opened up about her third pregnancy.
Earlier this month, Lowry, 24, wrote about her situation on her website.
"I am pregnant," she wrote . "I'm sad that I should have known that people in my life would sell me out before I was ready. Like any normal person, I want it to be a happy time. I wanted this to be a private time so I could be excited while not getting chased by paparazzi and bothered with crazy headlines."
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below "Please know this was a choice I made," she continued. "I already know some won't agree but I've been showered with support by the ones I love since I found out. Why did I wait? I've had a lot of health complications leading up to this pregnancy and I was not ready to release such private information on my own just yet being that I am so high risk with this pregnancy. I didnâ€™t want to announce just to have another miscarriage and suffer through another grief."
Speaking with Us Weekly talked more about her decision.
"Isaac and Lincoln are excited," she said about her two other sons.
"I'm not hoping for one of the other," she added. "I don't find out [the sex of the kids] until birth. I like the surprise."
Although she hasn't spoken about her pregnancy with ex-husband Javi Marroquin, she has discussed it ex-boyfriend with Jo Rivera.
"Jo has shared his concerns with me and we are working through them," she said. "But he has been supportive overall and just said we will figure it all out. Babies are blessings."
That they are! Yay for babies!
Follow Laura on Twitter .
